source:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_00The Adventurers' Guild investigator is eyeing the troupe currently occupying Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre with suspicion.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_00※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

グリダニアの冒険者ギルドの調査員は、冒険者に相談したいことがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_01The Adventurers' Guild investigator speaks to you of unsettling rumors regarding the Continental Circus's All Saints' Wake masquerade. He's heard tell of revelers going missing from the manor in which the gala is held, and given the Impresario's history of mischief─and more─thinks it prudent to further investigate these claims. For reasons related to the investigator's own lack of subtlety, it falls to you to speak with the Impresario and attempt to divine whether his intentions are malicious.

※Please note that you will not be able to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_01※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

冒険者ギルドの調査員から、コンチネンタル・サーカスが主催している仮装パーティーの会場で、行方不明者が出ていると相談を受けた。彼は、コンチネンタル・サーカスの関与を疑っているようだ。真相を探るため、ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂にいる「ダンチョー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_02<tab>You approach the Impresario, and in the course of your conversation cannot help but notice that he is indeed plotting something sinister in order to revive the legendary Night of Devilry, though you know not what. He also appears to be concerned that someone is watching him─though not concerned enough to cease uttering his thoughts aloud, it seems. When he at last stops talking, you hear another voice, no more than a whisper, from somewhere behind you.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_02<tab>ダンチョーと話した。やはり何かを企んでいるようだ。冒険者が戻ろうとしたところ、ダンチョーが周囲を気にしていることに気付いた。そこへ、どこからともなく謎の声がきこえた。ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA2D01 /var>」で、辺りを見渡してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_03<tab>Your search for the source of the mysterious voice leads you to the gates of the amphitheatre, where you once again hear its haunting words. It beckons to you in a way rather too overtly ghostly to be believable, but it's best to let it carry on while you seek its owner.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_03<tab>辺りを見渡した。周囲には怪しい人影はないが、またしても謎の声がきこえた。どうやら、冒険者を呼んでいるようだ。口笛粉屋付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA1F01 /var>」で、更に辺りを見渡してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_04<tab>To your surprise, the source of the voice belongs to the more chipper one of two ghost-shaped All Saints' Wake decorations, which you later learn have been magicked to life. The sort-of ghosts reveal that they are privy to the Impresario's plan─to turn party guests into pumpkins, thereby generating sufficient terror to bring about the Night of Devilry─and have also witnessed a young girl being kidnapped from the masquerade by a member of the troupe for this purpose.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_04<tab>再び周囲を見渡すと、2体のゴースト人形が現れた。彼らは、特別な力によって、言葉を話したり動いたりすることができるようになった人形のようだ。ゴースト人形たちによると、コンチネンタル・サーカスは、仮装パーティーの参加者をカボチャの姿に変身させ、「恐怖の力」を集めようと計画しているらしい。ゴースト人形たちから得た情報を、ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂付近にいる「冒険者ギルドの調査員」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_05<tab>Upon hearing the tale of the kidnapped girl, the investigator immediately connects it with a report made to the Wood Wailers, and concludes that the child must be a missing girl, T'maritaa. You must work fast if you are to save her from the Impresario's clutches before she comes to harm, so the investigator encourages you to infiltrate the masquerade while he prepares a more robust rescue unit.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_05<tab>冒険者ギルドの調査員に報告した。仮装パーティーで行方不明となっているのは、チャ・マリターという名の女の子ということだ。ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂にいる「仮装パーティーの招待係」と話し、仮装パーティーの参加者として廃屋敷に潜入し調査しよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_06<tab>You successfully pose as a party guest to enter the manor, which is remarkably thoroughly decorated for the venue of a mere ruse. Somewhere, T'maritaa is presumably being held, and where your unlikely co-conspirators await.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_06<tab>仮装パーティーの招待係と話し、廃屋敷に移動した。まずは、廃屋敷の「陰気なゴースト人形」たちと合流しよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_07<tab>Wading through the sea of jack-o'-lanterns and other garish decorations, you seek out the two non-ghosts whose acquaintance you made in Old Gridania, Little Yin and Yang. They have a notion to change your appearance to that of a fell fiend─the sort of creature that the troupe's mummers are in truth─that you may more easily extract information regarding T'maritaa's whereabouts. Little Yin gives you some time to mentally prepare, and awaits your go-ahead.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SEQ_07<tab>陰気なゴースト人形と話した。行方不明者たちの居場所を探るためには、道化師たちを油断させて手がかりとなる情報を引き出すことが、近道となりそうだ。引き続き、ゴースト人形たちと協力してコンチネンタル・サーカスの悪巧みを阻止しよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_00<tab>Speak to the Impresario.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_00<tab>ダンチョーと話す

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_01<tab>Search for the source of the voice at the destination.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA2D01 /var>で見渡す

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_02<tab>Search for the source of the voice at the destination.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA1F01 /var>で見渡す

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_03<tab>Report to the Adventurers' Guild investigator.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_03<tab>冒険者ギルドの調査員に報告する

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_04<tab>Speak to the genial guiser.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_04<tab>仮装パーティーの招待係と話す

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_05<tab>Speak to Little Yin.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_TODO_05<tab>廃屋敷の陰気なゴースト人形と話す

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_000<tab>Ah, we meet again! Much to my relief, frankly─I could use the help of an adventurer who knows the Continental Circus and their fiendish proclivities.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_000あなたは、確か以前にも……！
実は、今とても心配なことが起きていまして……。
よかったら力を貸していただけませんか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_001<tab>I imagine you won't be surprised to hear that they're up to something new this year, and it doesn't seem entirely above board.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_001また「コンチネンタル・サーカス」絡みの案件なのです。
「守護天節」の時期にエオルゼア諸国にやってきては、
様々な出し物をしている旅芸人の一座ですが……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_002<tab>Not that <var 1A 02 /var>anything<var 1A 01 /var> a troupe of fell fiends posing as law-abiding citizens does is truly above board, but─well, you know.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_002ご存知のとおり……団員たちは「人」ではないのです。
特殊な能力で人に化けている、魔物の集団なのですよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_003<tab>Aha, a fellow adventurer! If you have a moment, I could use your help investigating a suspicious incident. Potential incident. Well, something that's generally suspicious.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_003あなたは、見たところ冒険者のようですね。
実は、今とても心配なことが起きていまして……。
よかったら力を貸していただけませんか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_004<tab>Have you heard of the Continental Circus? I mean the group of performers in the amphitheatre over there─they unfailingly appear in Eorzea every All Saints' Wake.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_004「コンチネンタル・サーカス」についてはご存知でしょうか？
「守護天節」の時期にエオルゼア諸国にやってきては、
様々な出し物をしている旅芸人の一座なのですが……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_005<tab>However, just between you and me, they aren't truly performers at all! Not in the traditional sense. In fact, they're─and try to remain calm─fell fiends in disguise! Imps and tricksters and the like, you see.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_005実は、ここだけの話……団員たちは「人」ではないのです。
特殊な能力で人に化けている、魔物の集団なのですよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_006<tab>Now, the Adventurers' Guild policy on the matter is to live and let revel as long as they don't get up to anything <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> evil, but I have reason to suspect they're plotting something truly diabolical for this year's “festivities.”
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_006……とはいえ、大きな悪さをしない限りは、
市民の混乱を避けるため監視だけに留めていたのですが……。
彼ら主催の宴の場で、異変が起きているようなのです。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_007<tab>The troupe has been inviting folk to a certain manor, ostensibly for a “marvelous masquerade” in the spirit of All Saints' Wake. But I have been keeping constant watch, ever alert for signs of villainy, and the whispers of passersby tell a different story. I've even heard that some who entered have yet to return!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_007彼らは今、守護天節を盛り上げるためと称し、
廃屋敷に人々を招いて「仮装パーティー」を開催しています。
ですが、その会場で行方不明者が出ているのだとか……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_008<tab>Personally, I feel that whisking the citizenry away into the night is a spot of mischief too far. And I'm sure you agree that something should be done before harm comes to unsuspecting revelers. We need to find out what the troupe is <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> up to─by feigning interest in the party.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_008そこで、あなたにご協力いただきたいのです。
仮装パーティーに興味があるフリをしてサーカスに近付き、
「ダンチョー」と話をして真相を探っていただけませんか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_009<tab>The Impresario seems to have realized that I'm investigating the Circus─I can't imagine how. Regardless, he will know that I have ulterior motives, so you must go alone and then report back to me. I'll try to dig up additional information on the missing persons in the meantime.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_009彼らが裏で何かを企んでいるかもしれません……。
私も引き続き行方不明者について、情報収集を続けてみます。
もし何か手がかりをつかめたら、私までご連絡くださいね！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_010<tab>Try to prise some information about the missing persons out of the Impresario if you can. But don't let on that I sent you!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_010ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂にいる「ダンチョー」と話して、
行方不明者について何か知っていることがないか、
探っていただきたいのです。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CLOWNGATEKEEPER03169_000_011<tab>I'm sorry <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, but this year's festivities are so popular that we can fit not a single additional morta─er, guest in the mansion at the moment.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CLOWNGATEKEEPER03169_000_011仮装パーティー会場は、ただいま混みあっております。
ご案内可能になるまで、少々お待ちくださいネ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_020<tab>Oh my, is that a familiar adventurer I spy? Hmmm... Though perhaps I am mistaken, for much and more is not as it seems this time of year, wouldn't you agree? Whoever you may be, I do hope you are having a properly <var 1A 02 /var>dreadful<var 1A 01 /var> All Saints' Wake.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_020おやァ？
見覚えのある冒険者サマ……私の記憶違いでしょうか。
それはさておき、不幸な守護天節をお過ごしですかな？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_021<tab>Oh my, is that an adventurer I spy? I do hope you are having a properly <var 1A 02 /var>dreadful<var 1A 01 /var> All Saints' Wake.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_021おやァ？
これはこれは冒険者サマ、お目にかかれて光栄です。
不幸な守護天節をお過ごしですかな？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_022<tab>You're not!?
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_022<tab>なんと、過ごせていない！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_023<tab>Dear, dear... That simply will not do. But dry your tears, for the Wake is still young, and there are many frights yet to come! I'm certain we can make room at our marvelous masquerade for such an illustrious adventurer as yourself.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_023それはとてもお気の毒……ですが、ご安心くださァい。
哀れな冒険者サマには、我々主催の仮装パーティーへご招待！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_024<tab>Yes, a masquerade! Where the guests don guises both fulsome and frightful, and dance as long as they dare. Does that not sound charmingly reminiscent of the Night of Devilry in faerie tales?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_024人々が魔物や異形の姿に扮しては乱痴気騒ぎ。
どうです、あの伝説の「魔人の夜」のようでしょう？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_025<tab>Oh, to revel in such ghoulish delights! To join the madness in the streets, to see that palest of pumpkinheads leading a magnificent medley of fiends! It has been so long since the coming of the last true Night... How I curse each year wasted in the Great Gourd's absence!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_025あぁ、素晴らしきかな魔人の夜！
白く美しい「パンプキンヘッドの魔人」に率いられた魔物が、
縦横無尽に都市で暴れまわる、混沌と破壊に満ちた恐怖の夜！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_100_025<tab>Ahem. Pardon me─I simply adore the idea of an authentic celebration. And though the Circus does its best each All Saints' Wake, we lack the, er, manpower to truly impart the thrill of this season the realm over.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_100_025だがしかし、我らが崇拝する「パンプキンヘッドの魔人」が消え、
あの素晴らしき夜が失われ、長い刻が過ぎました！
あぁ、口惜しい！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_026<tab>What we do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> lack, though, is a frightfully abandoned mansion for our masquerade. Why, there are even rumors that its furnishings, with no master to serve, have taken on lives of their own and hold baleful banquets in the darkness of night! Aren't you dying to attend?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_026おおっと、失敬……ついつい興奮してしまいました。
仮装パーティー会場は、誰も足を踏み入れなくなって久しい廃屋敷。
主を失った人形たちまでもが、夜な夜な宴を開いているとか……！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_A1_000_001<tab>I do have a few dozen guises I've been working on...
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_A1_000_001<tab>仮装パーティーに参加したい！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_A1_000_002<tab>What about the rumors of those who enter, never to return?
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_A1_000_002<tab>行方不明者が出てるって本当？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_027<tab>How splendid! In that case, you will no doubt want to join the masquerade forthwith. Do mind your surroundings when you enter the manor, though. Its corridors are labyrinthine, and who knows what frights lie in store?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_027素晴らしい！
しかし、気をつけてくださいネ。
廃屋敷は広く、迷子になっても不思議はありませんから。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_028<tab>Hm? I cannot say rumors of that sort have reached me, though they do sound like the makings of a chilling tale! I wouldn't be surprised if the mansion's sprawling corridors confused a guest or two, however.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_028……え？
行方不明者だなんて、何かの間違いでは？
ただし、廃屋敷は広く、迷子が出ても不思議はありませんね。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_029<tab>Regardless, I'm sure you'll have an absolutely spine-tingling time!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_029とにもかくにも冒険者サマ、面倒事などすっかり忘れて、
仮装パーティーを、震え上がるほどお楽しみくださいネ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_030<tab>Yes, and when mortal terror is at its zenith, the Night of Devilry shall return at long last...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_030そう……震え上がるほど……
その「恐怖の力」が、魔人の夜の糧に…………

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_031<tab>Oh, that? Merely a new slogan for the Continental Circus, of course. To help revelers get in the spirit and such. Now, off you go!
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_031<tab>ああいえ、こちらの話ですヨォ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_032<tab>...
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_032<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_033<tab>Why do I feel as if I'm being watched? Surely no one is aware of our true intentions <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> time...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_033それにしても、先程から妙な視線を感じますねェ。
まるで何かに見張られているような……。
我々の真の計画を知るものなどいないはずですが……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_035<tab>(-???-)Psst! I'm watching yooou. Ooo...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_035(-？？？？-)そこの！
こっち、こっち！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SYSTEM_100_035<tab>Whispers seem to emanate from somewhere nearby...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SYSTEM_100_035「ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂」の入口付近で、謎の声が聞こえた。
声の主を探してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_034<tab>Who could be watching me? Aside from that odd fellow by the gate, of course.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_IMPHEAD_000_034<tab>それにしても、何かに見張られているような……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_036<tab>I'm keeping a close eye on activity at the amphitheatre. Let me know if you learn anything further of the Continental Circus's plans.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_036状況はいかがでしょうか？
もし何か手がかりをつかめたら、私までご連絡くださいね！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_036<tab>(-???-)Over heeere! Woooooo...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_036(-？？？？-)もっとこっちにおいで！
早く、早く！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SYSTEM_000_037<tab>The voice continues its valiant attempt to sound spooky as it moves toward the Whistling Miller.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_SYSTEM_000_037今度は「口笛粉屋」の方で謎の声が聞こえた。
もう一度、声の主を探してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_PUMPKIN_000_040<tab>(-???-)Delighted to be alive at last, aren't we, little ones?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_PUMPKIN_000_040(-？？？？-)クス……クスクス……。
あなたたち、仮初めの命を手に入れたことが、
よっぽど嬉しいのね……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_PUMPKIN_100_040<tab>Fear not, they mean you no harm.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_PUMPKIN_100_040クスクス……。
怪しい者じゃないわ、警戒しなくても大丈夫よ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_PUMPKIN_110_040<tab>I do believe we've met before. Yes, in an autumn such as this...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_PUMPKIN_110_040クスクス……。
あら、以前もどこかで会ったことがある気がするわね。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_PUMPKIN_120_040<tab>Now, didn't you two have something to tell our friend here?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_PUMPKIN_120_040ほら……イタズラもいいけれど、
伝えたいことがあるのでしょう？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_041<tab>Heheheh! You should've seen your face! It was hilarious! We went “boo!” and your eyes got huge and─you know, now that you mention it, I don't actually remember what we came here to talk about!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_041ぷふーっ！
の驚いた顔、ちょーユカイだったよ！
そうそう伝えたいこと……えっと、なんだっけ？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_042<tab><sigh> The plot. The evil one. The one that involves being loud and irritating in our mansion.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_042…………はぁ。
奴らが企んでいることを暴露してやるんでしょう？
ボクたちの屋敷で仮装パーティーなんて、煩いったらないですよ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_043<tab>Oh, right! So, the other day, when I was sitting in the foyer being decorative─which is the same thing I did every day back before I could move, come to think of it─I saw a mummer carry a little girl away to the dark depths of the mansion. I could hardly believe my eyeholes!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_043そうそう、私たち見ちゃったの！
女の子が怪しいサーカスの道化師について行っちゃったところ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_044<tab>Suspicious, right? And horrifying! But I couldn't do anything about it, on account of having no mouth to scream with. I mean, I <var 1A 02 /var>had<var 1A 01 /var> a mouth, but it didn't do anything, me being frippery and all. Anyway, that's when the lady with the hideous pumpkin on her head came along and imbued me with life!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_044事件の予感でしょ？
どうしよう、どうしようって慌ててたら、
そこのカボチャ頭のオバサンが、動けるようにしてくれたの！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_045<tab>Please stop talking. You'll get us both turned back into objets d'art.
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_045<tab>……そこはお姉さんって言っておかないと。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_046<tab>Right. So, what matters is that we began keeping an eye on the Impresario. And wouldn't you know it, he's plotting something.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_046とにかく、不審に思ってダンチョーを見張っていたんです。
そしたら案の定、裏の計画があったってわけですよ……はぁ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_047<tab>As you are aware, the Continental Circus is luring people to the mansion for a masquerade. Once there, the guests will be kidnapped and turned into jack-o'-lanterns to inspire terror. With enough terrified victims, the troupe will be able to usher in the Night of Devilry.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_047奴らは、仮装パーティーに参加した人々を連れ去って、
カボチャの姿に変えてしまおうとしているらしいのです。
「恐怖の力」を集めて、「魔人の夜」を再現するために……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_048<tab>It's a nuisance, honestly.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_048はぁ……迷惑な話ですよ……。
ボクはただ静かに過ごしたいっていうのに……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_049<tab>I've resigned myself to the fact that I'll have to go out of my way to deal with this. If you want to put a stop to the Impresario's plans, I can help.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_049、
力を貸すので一緒に何とかしてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_050<tab>Me too, me too! The thought of that poor little girl being turned into a pumpkin and stuck in a corner is enough to send a chill down my seam. It would be terrible! Dreadful! The greatest travesty this world has ever seen! So...you'll keep it from happening, right?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_050私からもお願い！
女の子に何かあったら、もう大惨事だからさ！
かわいそうだから、助けてあげようよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_051<tab>Amazing! I knew we could count on you─well, not really, I suppose, since I just met you a few moments ago, but you do seem nice! Anyway, we'll head back to the mansion and meet you there!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_051そうこなくっちゃ！
じゃあ、私たちは先に屋敷に行ってるから、
、待ってるねー！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_PUMPKIN_000_052<tab>Heh heh heh... They certainly are enjoying themselves. The joy of conversation is a novelty to them, though to you it may be unworthy of remark.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_PUMPKIN_000_052クスクス……とっても張り切って、かわいい子たち。
初めてヒトとお話しできるのが嬉しいのね。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_060<tab>Did you glean anything of the Impresario's master plan?
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_060<tab>何かわかったことはありましたか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_061<tab>Witnesses saw a mummer absconding with a little girl? That must be the Miqo'te child who was reported missing!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_061なんだって！？
道化師についていったまま、未だ帰らぬ女の子がいるですって？
その子だ……その子に間違いありませんよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_062<tab>I inquired with the Wood Wailers as to whether there have been any suspicious incidents of late, and it seems they have been searching for one T'maritaa at the request of her family.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_062鬼哭隊に問い合わせたところ、
1件の捜索願が、ご家族によって出されていたのです。
行方不明者はミコッテ族の女の子で、名前はチャ・マリター！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_063<tab>The situation is already far worse than I'd feared. We must locate the child at once, before any harm befalls her!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_063困ったことになってきたぞ……。
大事になる前に、マリターちゃんを見つけ出さなくては！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_064<tab>I will report what you've discovered to the Wood Wailers, and prepare to lead a raid on the mansion. In the meantime, you ought to disguise yourself and infiltrate the masquerade. See if you can discern where the girl is being held.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_064私は鬼哭隊に、この件を報告して突入準備を整えます。
あなたは、仮装パーティーの参加者として廃屋敷に潜り込み、
先行して現地で捜索していただけませんか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_065<tab>My thanks! I've seen the genial guiser escorting folk to the manor, so once your chosen costume is in place you should be able to convince him to let you inside.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_065ありがとうございます！
「仮装パーティーの招待係」に話しかければ、
仮装パーティー会場へ案内してもらえるはずですよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_066<tab>You should be able to convince the genial guiser to let you enter the manor. Best of luck!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_066ご協力に感謝します！
「仮装パーティーの招待係」に話しかければ、
仮装パーティー会場へ案内してもらえるはずですよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CLOWNGATEKEEPER03169_000_070<tab>Oho, another reveler ready to join our marvelous masquerade!
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CLOWNGATEKEEPER03169_000_070<tab>楽しい楽しい仮装パーティー、開催中ですよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_EVENTAREA_WARP_000_071<tab>Enter the manor?
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_EVENTAREA_WARP_000_071<tab>「廃屋敷」へ入りますか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_080<tab>I love having all of these people around! Yin doesn't care for the noise, and there's the whole horrendous kidnapping plot and all, but it's still fun to see the place so lively!
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_080<tab>賑やかで楽しいねー！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CLOWNGATEKEEPER03169_100_080<tab>Oho, another reveler ready to join our marvelous masquerade!
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CLOWNGATEKEEPER03169_100_080<tab>楽しい楽しい仮装パーティー、開催中ですよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_EVENTAREA_WARP_100_080<tab>Enter the manor?
target: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_EVENTAREA_WARP_100_080<tab>「廃屋敷」へ入りますか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_081<tab>Took you long enough. I'm not sure how much more of this “revelry” I can endure.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_081あ、……。
……待ちくたびれましたよ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_082<tab>Oh wow, you're here already! I've been so busy reveling that the time just flew by!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_082、いらっしゃい！
早かったねー！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_083<tab><sigh> Do you see what I put up with? Regardless, we should seek out the malevolent mummers and try to get some information on where they are keeping her. Pray that she hasn't already been turned into a pumpkin, or we'll be here for moons.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_083手始めに、女の子と一緒にいた怪しい道化師たちを探し、
行方不明者の居所について、情報を引き出しましょう。
すでにカボチャにされていたら見分けが付きませんからね……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_084<tab>I doubt the mummers will tell us what we need to know if we ask politely, so we'll need to employ a bit of deception. Fortunately, I came up with a plan during the ample time you left me to think.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_084そこで、ボクにひとつ策があります……。
道化師たちは、人の姿をしていてもその正体は魔物……。
そこをうまく利用すれば、奴らを油断させることができるはず……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_085<tab>They should be more willing to speak to one of their own─namely, a fiend. So we'll need to turn you into one.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_085……そうです。
には、魔物の姿に「変身」してもらいます。
詳細は、後ほどお話ししましょう……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_086<tab>I bet you're wondering how we'll make you into a monster! You are, aren't you? Well, see, our very close friend with the hideou─I mean, festive pumpkin head has all sorts of powers. All sorts! And we asked to borrow one or two or three!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_086どうやって「変身」するかって？
モチロン、カボチャ頭のオバ……オネーサンに頼んで、
手段は用意してるんだな！

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_087<tab>Indeed. The powers we have will allow us to transfigure your appearance just as the members of the troupe do, albeit temporarily.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_087道化師たちは、スキンチェンジャーという特殊な能力を使って、
見た目を自由に変えることができます……。
それに近い能力を、一時的に与えてもらいました……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_088<tab>Go ahead and adjust to the idea of your visage being horribly reconfigured. When you're ready, let me know and I'll explain the plan in detail.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW501_03169_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_088さあ、準備が整ったら、
ボクに話しかけてくださいね……。
